turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get two small pizzas, one with barbecue chicken, and then the other one I want to do Italian sausage and banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 small pizzas, 1 chicken bbq and the other italian sausage and bannana peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Could I also add extra cheese to both of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can add that, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $30, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
